1.text: Pour 2 cups (256 g) of granulated sugar into a bowl.

2.text: Mix in 1⁄2  c (120 mL) of melted coconut oil.

3.text: Drop 15 to 20 drops of peppermint essential oil into the mixture.

4.text: Divide the scrub into 2 equal parts.

5.text: Mix in 2 drops of red food coloring into 1 part of the sugar mix.

6.text: Add alternating layers of white and red scrub to a glass jar.

7.text: Press down on the sugar scrub with a spoon to compact it.

8.text: Seal the jar with a lid to keep it airtight.

9.text: Stick a label onto the front of the jar for a cute gift.
